page.title: 17Interview with the Rector
page.content: The rector of St.Nicholas' Church, Ashchurch, is Rev.K.Corless. His job is to look after the church and visit people who need help.He also visits schools to talk about Jesus and God. These are a few of his answers to some of our questions.We asked him how long he had been working in the church and he answered 24 years but only 16 years at Ashchurch.Another question was do you have any spare time? He said very little but when I have I do model engineering,art and collecting match boxes.We also asked him have you ever seen a ghost? The reply was:'No I haven't'.(The rector keeps an open mind about ghosts and he feels if ghosts exist, they are probably nice). The church costs Â£1200 to run a year. The rector said his favourite story out of the bible is Joshua and the walls of Jericho.
